subject_line: Stop wasting hours on contract redlines
body:
Hi there,

Let me guess – you've spent way too many hours this month scrolling between two versions of the same contract, trying to figure out what changed.

You're not alone. We've heard from hundreds of founders who say the same thing: "I just want to see what changed, not read everything again."

That's why we built Document Compare.

It's stupid simple:

1. Upload two documents (any format – DOCX, PDF, Genie docs)
2. Get instant side-by-side redlines showing exactly what changed
3. Share clean comparison with your team in seconds

No legal degree required. No expensive lawyer fees. Just clarity.

What our users are saying:

"This would save me from begging our counsel to check every clause." – Sarah, Founder

"Feels like magic when it shows the redlines correctly." – Internal beta tester

The best part? It's free to try.

Click here to compare your first documents: [app.genieai.co/compare]

Stop wasting time. Start making faster, confident decisions.

Best,
The Genie AI Team

P.S. Document Compare works with all your existing contracts. No migration needed.
